article.title: General Atomics to Retrofit Reapers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems of Poway, California, is being awarded an $87,338,761 firm fixed price, cost plus fixed fee contract for MQ-9 Reaper FY10/11 Retrofit Kits and Installations for up to 80 aircraft.Â The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
